testcase.name: verify login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to Bookit API as a teacher.............................passed When user sends GET request to "/api/users/me"..............................passed Then status code should be 200..............................................passed And content type is "application/json"......................................passed And role is "teacher".......................................................passed

testcase.name: list all available campuses
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to Bookit API as a teacher.............................passed When user sends GET request to "/api/clusters"..............................passed Then status code should be 200..............................................passed And content type is "application/json"......................................passed
